## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed unnecessary console.logs and debug code

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on multiple browsers (if UI changes)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new functions

### Database (if applicable)
- [ ] I have created/updated Prisma migrations
- [ ] I have tested migrations both up and down
- [ ] I have updated seed data if necessary
- [ ] Database changes are backward compatible (or breaking changes are documented)

### Security
- [ ] I have checked for security vulnerabilities (SQL injection, XSS, etc.)
- [ ] Sensitive data is properly handled and not exposed
- [ ] Authentication and authorization are properly implemented

### Performance
- [ ] I have considered the performance impact of my changes
- [ ] Database queries are optimized
- [ ] No N+1 query problems introduced
